alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 23 at 1:40PM MST until December 24 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Periods of moderate to heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 5 inches below 6500 feet with up 15 inches across the mountains and passes above 6500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph may create areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Central Mountains from Stanley to Picabo. * WHEN...Until noon MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills
